R

RecentActivity - Class in Utilities
This is used to get recent activity to make notifications
RecentActivity() - Constructor for class Utilities.RecentActivity
 
RecyclerViews - package RecyclerViews
 
Refresh - Class in Utilities
This is a class of methods to enable swipe down for request
Refresh() - Constructor for class Utilities.Refresh
 
refreshQuestions(Topics) - Method in class Utilities.Refresh
Given a parent topicID, the list of questions will be refreshed using android volley
refreshReplies(Question) - Method in class Student.StudentReplies
Given a parent question id, it will return a list of questions that directly correspond to the topic (not replies to replies)
refreshReplies(Question) - Method in class Teacher.TeacherReplies
Given a parent question id, it will return a list of questions that directly correspond to the topic (not replies to replies)
refreshRepliesOfReplies(Reply) - Method in class Utilities.Refresh
Given a parent reply id, it will return a list of replies to that reply
Reply - Class in Utilities
This is an object, reply It has the text that it contains, an amount of points, if it is endorsed or not, a timestamp, a creation username, a userid, an id, a reply parent (for if it is a reply of a reply) and a question that it was a reply to
Reply(String, String, boolean, String, String, String, Question, String, ArrayList<Reply>) - Constructor for class Utilities.Reply
Constructor for a reply
Reply() - Constructor for class Utilities.Reply
Create a reply object from the android app
replyID - Variable in class Utilities.Reply
 
report - Variable in class RecyclerViews.MyAdapterQuestionsStudent.ViewHolder
 
report() - Method in class Utilities.Question
Report the question to the admin
report() - Method in class Utilities.Reply
Report this reply to an admin
reportb - Variable in class RecyclerViews.MyAdapterReplies.ViewHolder
 
reportButton - Variable in class RecyclerViews.MyAdapterQuestions.ViewHolder
 
reportIt - Variable in class RecyclerViews.MyAdapterRepliesStudent.ViewHolder
 
ResetPassword - Class in Activities
This class is used when a user logins after having submitted a request for a temp password (thus their password is the temp password).
ResetPassword() - Constructor for class Activities.ResetPassword
 
resetPassword() - Method in class Activities.ResetPassword
This method will allow the user to type in their current password, and their desired new password (which they must do twice to confirm).
Roles - Enum in Utilities
This takes the number that represents a role and turns it into a meaningful name (admin, teacher, ta, or student)
